oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Smith & Wesson revolver and holster
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Civil War-era Smith & Wesson revolver and holster. Serial number 23363. Model number 2. Also known as the "Number 2 Army." Made from 1863 to 1864. This is the same model that Wild Bill Hickok supposedly was carrying when he was killed at Deadwood, South Dakota.
